item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud]]End of life for Kubernetes1.20
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 23, 17:00 UTC

Jan 4, 02:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.21).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.21).

item.title: [Global][Databases] - MongoDB upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 16, 01:00 UTC  -  Mar 26, 23:00 UTC

Jan 30, 22:40 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/03/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 26/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for business and enterprise plans, a small downtime may be experienced for essential plans (less than 15mn).
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade of our MongoDB offer.

item.title: [GRA][ManagedPrivateRegistry] - Registries version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 14, 19:00 - 23:00 UTC

Jan 17, 23:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/03/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 14/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : The registries will be set in read-only mode and the registries will be unavailable for a few minutes during the operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we need to perform a version upgrade on the registries.

item.title: [BHS/GRA][AI] - Notebooks/Training/Aps
item.description:
Jan 31, 14:10 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 26/01/2023 13:27 UTC
End Time : 31/01/2023 12:23 UTC
Service status : Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 30, 15:01 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jan 30, 15:00 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/01/2023 13:27 UTC
Service impact : You can't currently create an AI workload with a attached PCS volume using the manager. Workaround is to use the CLI, APIv6 or Regional API.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
